info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 11:03AM CDT until June 23 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Des Moines IA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...
Cedar River at Cedar Falls affecting Black Hawk County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...The Cedar River at Cedar Falls, or from the West Fork Cedar River to the Cedar Falls-Waterloo city limits.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Monday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 89.7 feet, Water affects the road at 1712 and 1118 Cottage Row Rd.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 87.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 89.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 89.0 feet.
info.instruction:
For the latest waterway observations and forecasts refer to weather.gov/desmoines/water.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
River forecasts include observed precipitation plus forecast precipitation over the next 24 hours.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH
